Herda is looking for her friend, Kai, who was kidnapped by a powerful wicked fairy, the Snow Queen, and taken to her kingdom. Travelling in search of her dear friend, Herda finds herself in the castle of a sly and treacherous, though funny, king, gets acquainted with forest robbers.
